resources.string: From here, You can choose to see all or one of the 5 different domains.
After that, you click on a circle and view its description by sliding up the banner.
This arrow will take you to the selected objective.
This button will open the selected track. We suggest you visit this objectives by bicycle!
From this group you can choose from the 4 routes suggested by us, depending on the level of difficulty
This button will show you the position and objective closest to You.
For more details about us and what we do, please feel free to visit us on our website
For now, you can see the next event from our town
This route consists of several different objectives

Ce face acest proiect?



   Promovează valorile și tradițiile istorice și culturale din Municipiul Baia Mare,prin dezvoltarea de rețele tematice, culturale, de cicloturism.




   Practic, am identificat în teren punctele de interes cultural din diverse domenii.Traseele create se disting după culori, astfel că turistul își poate alege domeniul în funcție de interesele acestuia:



  •	    Traseul Roșu – Arte



  • 	Traseul Galben – Istorie



  •	    Traseul Verde – Natură



  •	    Traseul Albastru – Mineralogie
              / Cosmologie



  •    	Traseul Violet – Teatre
              / Centre de expoziție





   Mai mult, partenerii noștri, ne ajută să semnalizăm în timp real, ce evenimente culturale există în oraș sau urmează să se desfășoare.

This app promotes Baia Mare’s cultural objectives, including natural landscapes, and cycling.
Why? Because it’s so much easier to visit this town on 2 wheels.
Beeing a medium size town, You won’t feel the crowd from a big or a capital city, but in the same time,
You won’t see a serious infrastructure like lanes or green lights and crossings for bicycle.
It’s not such a big problem though, ‘cause You can ride on the street like a regular car and on sidewalks, but be careful.

You have 5 different colours to choose from, and a general list: 



  •	 	Red – Arts



  •	 	Yellow – History



  •	 	Green – Nature



  •	 	Blue – Mineralogy + Planetarium



  •	 	Purple – Theatres + Exhibition Centres

We also propose 4 tracks, containing objectives from different colors, to follow depending on your time and difficulty: 



  • 	Light - 1 to 2 hours



  • 	Medium - 2 to 4 hours



  •     Hard - 6 to 8 hours



  • 	Extreme - 8 to 10 hours

Using it:



   The first screen will let you choose one of the five different colors, or if You just want to see them all, press the middle of the wheel.

You can see your exact location when you press the location button, in the upper right corner of the screen. 




   To go back in the first screen, hold the wheel from the right-down corner for 2 seconds.

From the main menu, You can choose one of the 4 tracks proposed by us, if You want to combine different objectives. 



   You can also see a list of bike friendly bars and events to come. 



     Click on an objective from the map to see its description and if You want to go there, click on the arrow next to its name. It will open your Google Maps and calculate your route from your location.
